p: As HIV-1 infection induces macrophages fusion into MGC ( Vérollet et al., 2010), the number of infected cells largely underestimates the rate of infection. Thus, to better reflect the rate of infection, we quantified the percentage of MGC. Using semi-automatic quantification with homemade Image J macros, allowing the study of more than 5,000 cells per condition in at least five independent donors, we assessed these parameters.
